songs.title: American Fool
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Oh say can you see
The bombs bursting in air
Get off the plane
Open my mouth
Say I’m to blame
For what’s going down

[Pre-Chorus]
Okay, let’s talk about it
Okay, let’s talk about it
From the USA-A-A
Up in my fa-a-ace
Oh, I-I-I-I

[Chorus]
I guess I’m just another heart
American fool
So what you gonna do?
With this American
With this American fool
I’m just an American fool
Just an American
I’m just an American fool
Just an American

[Verse 2]
We're dropping bombs
I know it’s wrong
But I can’t help
Where I’m from
C'mon, let’s talk about
I want to talk about it

[Pre-Chorus]
From the USA-A-A-A
Such a fucking disgra-a-ace
Oh, I-I-I-I

[Chorus]
I guess I’m just another heart
American fool
So what you gonna do?
With this American
With this American fool
I’m just an American fool
Just an American
I’m just an American fool
Just an American

[Bridge]
Stop giving me shit, stop
Stop it
Stop giving me shit, stop
Stop it
Stop giving me shit, stop
Stop it
Stop giving me shit, stop
Stop it

[Chorus]
I guess I’m just another heart
American fool
So what you gonna do?
With this American
With this American fool
I’m just an American fool
Stop giving me shit, stop
Just an American
Stop it
I’m just an American fool
Stop giving me shit, stop
Just an American
Stop it
